src.configuration package¶

Submodules¶

src.configuration.config module¶

This module handles reading and parsing the configuration file located at /etc/bibicreator/config.ini.

class src.configuration.config.Configuration(parsedINI)¶

Bases: object

Class for parsing an .ini file. Also checks mandatory fields in the configuration.
